summary: Ever wonder why deer pelts couldn\'t be tanned into leather, while deer hides could? Well wonder no more!
descriptionHtml:
Requested by GrimReapers1

This is my very first CK mod ever!! *yayyyyyyyyyy* *minor applause*

So yeah, ever come back from a day of hunting, excited to tan your pelts and hides into nice crisp leather?!?! And when you were done spamming the tanning rack and produced dozens of leathers, you looked in your inventory to find a cruddy piece of animal skin called a Deer Pelt? 

Ever spend countless seconds (like 30 seconds. seriously) going back in forth with the tanning rack to figure out why you couldn\'t tan this god forsaken piece of epidermis?!

Well NOW ALL YOUR DREAMS WILL COME TRUE because this mod lets you finally tan those pesky deer pelts into 2 pieces of nice... crisp... hard... delicious leather! FINALLY!!!

okay yeah I guess thats it.

Download and extract into your Skyrim directory, also read the readme.

Download, Comment, Endorse, and Track even though there will be no future updates ever.
author: tehandyman
